ResearchProjectDef.label: simple coffee

ResearchProjectDef.label: buzz coffee
ResearchProjectDef.description: Make buzz coffee, it's very potent but can be dangerous to consume regularly. (Teir 3 of coffeeness)

ResearchProjectDef.label: sweet decaf coffee
ResearchProjectDef.description: Make sweet decaf coffee, it's less addictive and makes colonists happy. Unlocks the decaffeination station. (Teir 4 of coffeeness)
